text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Mariupol Raion | native_name = Маріупольський район | native_name_lang = uk | settlement_type = Raion | image_skyline = | image_map = Mariupol Rayon 2020.svg | mapsize = 225px | map_alt = | map_caption = | pushpin_map = | coordinates_footnotes = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = | subdivision_type1 = Oblast | subdivision_name1 = | established_title = Established | established_date = 2020 | government_footnotes = | leader_name1 = | unit_pref = Metric | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = 2620 | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = | population_footnotes = | population_total = 502909 | population_as_of = 2022 | population_density_km2 = auto }} Mariupol Raion is one of the eight raions (districts) of Donetsk oblast in eastern Ukraine. Russian soldiers are occupying the district (as of 2023). ==Administrative divisions== ** Kalchyk (hromada) ** Manhush ** Mariupol (hromada) ** Nikolske ** Sartana ==Related page== *Warfare in eastern Ukraine during the Russo-Ukrainian War ==Sources== Category:Raions of Ukraine Category:Raions of Donetsk Oblast
title: Mariupol Raion
